lines.text: ...Maybe he didn't want to run for it.
Maybe he was worried you guys would show up and solve his crime!
Maybe he needed to stay there until he was sure all the evidence was gone, and he could make a clean escape.
Getting trapped in the fire was just... an accident?
I'm not askin' about why he didn't escape the room- it's the fire part I'm worried about.
And even if I was askin' that, your idea doesn't hold up.
Slick's no master thief- he's got a criminal record, and his MO is to grab the goods and run.
He wouldn't stick around in a burnin' building just to make sure he didn't leave any evidence.
